titles.title: Urging the people of the United States to observe October of each year as Italian and Italian-American Heritage Month.
Urging the people of the United States to observe October of each year as Italian and Italian-American Heritage Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Urges the people of the United States to acknowledge an Italian and Italian American Heritage Month in recognition of the contributions Italians and Italian Americans have made to this country and the world.
